typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> SchemaOnRead
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		RottenTomato as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> MoviesWithSchema
MapDriftedColumn, MoviesWithSchema join(MapDriftedColumn@movie == MoviesWithSchema@movie,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
SchemaOnRead derive(movie = toInteger(byName('movie')),
		each(match(type=='string'), $$+'_caps' = initCap($$))) ~> MapDriftedColumn
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		each(match(true()),
			replace($$,' ') = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:['parquetMovies.parquet'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
